bwwExcerpt: The surprise of "Diana the Musical," which is opening tonight at the Longacre Theater, is that it's more enjoyable - better! - on Broadway than it is on Netflix, where a recording of this stage musical about the life of Diana, Princess of Wales, has been streaming since October 1. Critics, especially British ones, eviscerated it: "comically misconceived" (The Times of London) "cringey...confusing..ickiest" (The Standard) 'What? What? WHAT?' (The Guardian.)
